headline: A Look At Enphase Energy (ENPH) Valuation After KeyBanc Upgrade To Sector Weight
summary: Enphase Energy (ENPH) drew investor attention after KeyBanc Capital Markets upgraded the stock to Sector Weight, citing concerns already reflected in the price and highlighting the company’s cash generation, lack of debt, and progress on inventory destocking. See our latest analysis for Enphase Energy. The KeyBanc upgrade comes after a choppy period for the stock, with an 8.8% 1 month share price return and a 5.6% 7 day share price return contrasting with a 53.8% 1 year total shareholder...
